radiographic_examinations.findings: The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. The contour of the liver is smooth. There is no focal liver mass. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is no ascites. There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CHD measures 9 mm. There is moderate gallbladder wall edema and cholelithiasis. The imaged portion of the pancreas appears within normal limits, without masses or pancreatic ductal dilation, with portions of the pancreatic tail obscured by overlying bowel gas. Normal echogenicity of spleen measuring 9.5 cm. Limited views of the right kidney show no hydronephrosis. The visualized portions of the aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
